title: Fix it already. Audio/fps bug impacting Mac users.
body: I'm currently in a game and the audio bug (where the sound completely goes static and robotic) has happened three times during lanning phase and I started lagging every time the enemy jungler ganked. Where is the fix?

replies.body: I stumbled across [this update on the EUW boards](http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-reports-eu/jT9W0Jc1-16-04-16-update-on-mac-performance-issue).  Looks like there's a promising fix on the PBE.  I don't understand why I had to go to a different region to find out about an update on such a huge issue like this though.
This is because the person who is replying only has an EUW account, as he works in one of the EUW offices.
